overview: When the night comes and there's only dark, we can hear the heart speaking louder than words. Alone in his bed and immersed in the absence of his lover, a man speaks to no one, begging for another night together. He surrenders to a nocturnal delirium which will fill his room and his head, and which he is willing to live it fully — at least until the morning rises.
title: Bedtime Stories: Minha Luta (I Miss You)
